Tag.description: Creates a key-value pair for a specific resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

type.description: The name assigned to the tag that you create.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

type.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name you create.

SftpConnectorTrustedHostKey.description: The public host key for the external server to which you are connecting.

properties.name: AccessRole
properties.description: Specifies the access role for the connector.

type.description: Specifies the access role for the connector.

properties.name: As2Config
properties.description: Configuration for an AS2 connector.

type.description: Configuration for an AS2 connector.

properties.name: LocalProfileId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.

type.description: A unique identifier for the local profile.

properties.name: PartnerProfileId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.

type.description: A unique identifier for the partner profile.

properties.name: MessageSubject
properties.description: The message subject for this AS2 connector configuration.

type.description: The message subject for this AS2 connector configuration.

properties.name: Compression
properties.description: Compression setting for this AS2 connector configuration.

type.description: Compression setting for this AS2 connector configuration.

properties.name: EncryptionAlgorithm
properties.description: Encryption algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

type.description: Encryption algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

properties.name: SigningAlgorithm
properties.description: Signing algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

type.description: Signing algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

properties.name: MdnSigningAlgorithm
properties.description: MDN Signing algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

type.description: MDN Signing algorithm for this AS2 connector configuration.

properties.name: MdnResponse
properties.description: MDN Response setting for this AS2 connector configuration.

type.description: MDN Response setting for this AS2 connector configuration.

properties.name: BasicAuthSecretId
properties.description: ARN or name of the secret in AWS Secrets Manager which contains the credentials for Basic authentication. If empty, Basic authentication is disabled for the AS2 connector

type.description: ARN or name of the secret in AWS Secrets Manager which contains the credentials for Basic authentication. If empty, Basic authentication is disabled for the AS2 connector

properties.name: SftpConfig
properties.description: Configuration for an SFTP connector.

type.description: Configuration for an SFTP connector.

properties.name: UserSecretId
properties.description: ARN or name of the secret in AWS Secrets Manager which contains the SFTP user's private keys or passwords.

type.description: ARN or name of the secret in AWS Secrets Manager which contains the SFTP user's private keys or passwords.

properties.name: TrustedHostKeys
properties.description: List of public host keys, for the external server to which you are connecting.

type.description: List of public host keys, for the external server to which you are connecting.

properties.name: LoggingRole
properties.description: Specifies the logging role for the connector.

type.description: Specifies the logging role for the connector.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for connectors. Tags are metadata attached to connectors for any purpose.

type.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for connectors. Tags are metadata attached to connectors for any purpose.

properties.name: Url
properties.description: URL for Connector

type.description: URL for Connector

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the connector.

type.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the connector.

properties.name: ConnectorId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the connector.

type.description: A unique identifier for the connector.
